datasets.name: 335817b5
datasets.displayName: Options for Read/Write/Both read and write
queryLines:
SELECT 'Read' AS operation
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Write'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Both read and write'

datasets.name: 44fbd6cc
queryLines:
SELECT 
    concat(catalog_name, '.', schema_name, '.', table_name) as full_name, 
    column_name,
    tag_name, 
    NULLIF(tag_value, '') as tag_value
FROM 
    system.information_schema.column_tags
WHERE
    (tag_name = :tag_name OR :tag_name = 'All Tag Names') 
    AND 
    (
        tag_value = :tag_value 
        OR :tag_value = 'All Tag Values' 
        OR (:tag_value = 'null' AND NULLIF(tag_value, '') IS NULL)

datasets.name: 1f2da46c
queryLines:
SELECT 
    concat(catalog_name, '.', schema_name, '.', table_name) as full_name, 
    tag_name, 
    NULLIF(tag_value, '') as tag_value
FROM 
    system.information_schema.table_tags
WHERE
    (tag_name = :tag_name OR :tag_name = 'All Tag Names') 
    AND 
    (
        tag_value = :tag_value 
        OR :tag_value = 'All Tag Values' 
        OR (:tag_value = 'null' AND NULLIF(tag_value, '') IS NULL)

datasets.name: 65ad5bdc
36efad9e
queryLines:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN tag_value = '' THEN 'null' 
        ELSE tag_value 
    END AS tag_value
FROM 
    system.information_schema.column_tags 
WHERE 
    :tag_name = tag_name 
    OR :tag_name = 'All Tag Names'
UNION
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN tag_value = '' THEN 'null' 
        ELSE tag_value 
    END AS tag_value
FROM 
    system.information_schema.table_tags 
WHERE 
    :tag_name = tag_name 
    OR :tag_name = 'All Tag Names'
ORDER BY
    CASE 
        WHEN tag_value = 'null' THEN 0 
        ELSE 1 
    END, 
    tag_value;

datasets.name: a2457846
datasets.displayName: Users who Interact with Table Tags
queryLines:
WITH
  reads AS (
    SELECT
      CONCAT(lat.source_table_catalog, '.', lat.source_table_schema, '.', lat.source_table_name) AS full_name,
      lat.created_by,
      COUNT(*) AS usage_count
    FROM
      system.access.table_lineage lat
    WHERE
      lat.source_type = 'TABLE' AND
      lat.source_table_name IS NOT NULL AND
      lat.event_time >= :date_range_start AND lat.event_time <= :date_range_end
    GROUP BY
      lat.source_table_catalog, lat.source_table_schema, lat.source_table_name, lat.created_by
  ),
  writes AS (
    SELECT
      CONCAT(lat.target_table_catalog, '.', lat.target_table_schema, '.', lat.target_table_name) AS full_name,
      lat.created_by,
      COUNT(*) AS usage_count
    FROM
      system.access.table_lineage lat
    WHERE
      lat.target_type = 'TABLE' AND
      lat.target_table_name IS NOT NULL AND
      lat.event_time >= :date_range_start AND lat.event_time <= :date_range_end
    GROUP BY
      lat.target_table_catalog, lat.target_table_schema, lat.target_table_name, lat.created_by
  ),
  combined AS (
    SELECT * FROM reads
    WHERE :toggle_parameter IN ('Read', 'Both read and write')
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM writes
    WHERE :toggle_parameter IN ('Write', 'Both read and write')
  ),
  tagged_tables AS (
    SELECT 
        CONCAT(tt.catalog_name, '.', tt.schema_name, '.', tt.table_name) as full_name, 
        * 
    FROM 
        system.information_schema.table_tags tt
    WHERE 
        (tt.tag_name = :tag_name OR :tag_name = 'All Tag Names') 
        AND (
          tt.tag_value = :tag_value 
          OR :tag_value = 'All Tag Values'
          OR (:tag_value = 'null' AND NULLIF(tt.tag_value, '') IS NULL)
          )
  )
SELECT 
    combined.created_by, 
    COUNT(*) AS usage_count
FROM 
    tagged_tables tt
JOIN 
    combined 
ON tt.full_name = combined.full_name
WHERE
    combined.created_by IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 
    combined.created_by
ORDER BY 
    usage_count DESC
LIMIT 20;

datasets.name: b3296006
datasets.displayName: Bar Chart of Tables with Tags
queryLines:
WITH TopTags AS (
  SELECT 
    tag_name
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      tag_name
    FROM 
      system.information_schema.table_tags
    WHERE 
      tag_name IS NOT NULL
      AND (tag_name = :tag_name OR :tag_name = 'All Tag Names')
  ) AS combined_tags
  GROUP BY 
    tag_name
  ORDER BY 
    COUNT(*) DESC
  LIMIT 20
),
TagNameValuePairs AS (
  SELECT
    tag_name,
    NULLIF(tag_value, '') AS tag_value
  FROM 
    system.information_schema.table_tags
  WHERE 
    tag_name IN (SELECT tag_name FROM TopTags)
    AND (NULLIF(tag_value, '') = :tag_value OR :tag_value = 'All Tag Values')
),
AggregatedUsage AS (
  SELECT
    tag_name,
    tag_value,
    COUNT(*) AS usage_count
  FROM 
    TagNameValuePairs
  GROUP BY 
    tag_name, tag_value
),
RankedTagValues AS (
  SELECT
    tag_name,
    tag_value,
    usage_count,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY tag_name ORDER BY usage_count DESC) AS tag_value_rank
  FROM 
    AggregatedUsage
)
SELECT 
  tag_name,
  tag_value,
  usage_count,
  tag_value_rank
FROM 
  RankedTagValues
WHERE 
  tag_value_rank <= 20
ORDER BY
  usage_count DESC;

datasets.name: a6cea75e
datasets.displayName: Pie Chart of Tagged Vs Untagged Tables
queryLines:
WITH tagged_count AS (
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM system.information_schema.table_tags
)
SELECT 'Tagged' AS label, count 
FROM tagged_count
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Untagged' AS label, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM system.information_schema.tables) - count 
FROM tagged_count;

datasets.name: 50d30f70
queryLines:
WITH 
usage_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        schema_name,
        SUM(usage_count) AS usage_count
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            CONCAT(lat.source_table_catalog, '.', lat.source_table_schema) AS schema_name,
            COUNT(*) AS usage_count
        FROM
            system.access.table_lineage lat
        WHERE
            lat.source_type = 'TABLE'
            AND lat.event_time >= :date_range_start 
            AND lat.event_time <= :date_range_end
        GROUP BY 
            lat.source_table_catalog, lat.source_table_schema
        
        UNION ALL
        
        SELECT 
            CONCAT(lat.target_table_catalog, '.', lat.target_table_schema) AS schema_name,
            COUNT(*) AS usage_count
        FROM
            system.access.table_lineage lat
        WHERE
            lat.target_type = 'TABLE'
            AND lat.event_time >= :date_range_start 
            AND lat.event_time <= :date_range_end
        GROUP BY 
            lat.target_table_catalog, lat.target_table_schema
    ) combined_usage
    GROUP BY 
        schema_name
),
schema_table_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        schemata.CATALOG_NAME || '.' || schemata.SCHEMA_NAME AS schema_name,
        COUNT(*) AS total_tables,
        COUNT(tagged.table_name) AS tagged_tables
    FROM 
        system.information_schema.schemata schemata
    LEFT JOIN 
        system.information_schema.tables tables
        ON schemata.SCHEMA_NAME = tables.table_schema
        AND schemata.CATALOG_NAME = tables.table_catalog
    LEFT JOIN 
        system.information_schema.table_tags tagged
        ON tables.table_catalog = tagged.catalog_name
        AND tables.table_schema = tagged.schema_name
        AND tables.table_name = tagged.table_name
    GROUP BY 
        schemata.CATALOG_NAME, schemata.SCHEMA_NAME
)
SELECT 
    usage_counts.schema_name,
    usage_counts.usage_count,
    schema_table_counts.total_tables,
    schema_table_counts.tagged_tables,
    (schema_table_counts.tagged_tables * 100.0 / schema_table_counts.total_tables) AS percent_tagged
FROM 
    usage_counts
JOIN 
    schema_table_counts
ON 
    usage_counts.schema_name = schema_table_counts.schema_name
ORDER BY 
    usage_counts.usage_count DESC
LIMIT 20;
